Body:
I have the following Arabic sentence and I am interested in the last three words which create a noun phrase. This np is translated as "Site Vaalat Excel" by google, which does not tell me much.

  ارجو ان تكون الفواتير على الموقع فايلات اكسيل

What I want to know is what is the main/head word in "الموقع فايلات اكسيل" noun phrase? For example in English it would be like this "Vaalat Excel site", so the main word would be "site" with "Vaalat" and "Excel" being attributes to this word. What about Arabic?
Title: Explain الموقع فايلات اكسيل noun phrase in Arabic
